page.title: 06Colvend: Education (cont'd)
page.content: We start school at 5 years old. After we've finished at Primary School at 12 years of age we go to Secondary School in Dalbeattie. In school we try to do Mathematics, Spelling, Reading and some other Language work every day. We usually do History,Geography,Science and Art in our school Projects. The children in our school are all different ages but we play and work together quite well.We think the small numbers are good because there are no bullies and you get more attention and more room to play outside. This year we are going to have the school modernized.We are having new toilets put inside and carpets on the floor. It will be very nice when it is finished.
